At the earnings call, Eric Schmidt was asked specifically about the government outreach part of his new role and he replied: We need to talk to them. They often don't understand what we're doing. This is aided by our rivals. So far we've been quite successful by just taking the time and getting people to understand what we're doing. The things we're doing are pro-competitive. I believe that.
